DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons
Languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

Traits.Name: Fragile Structure
Traits.Content: The Paper Golem has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that deal slashing damage.

Traits.Name: Adhesive Surface
Traits.Content: Any creature that touches the Paper Golem or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be grappled by it (escape DC 12).

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Paper Golem makes one attack with its Papercut Slash. If that attack hits, the Paper Golem can make one Paper Bind attack against the same target.

Actions.Name: Papercut Slash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, dealing 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have their movement speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Paper Bind
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, dealing 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage. On a hit, the target is restrained until the end of their next turn as the paper wraps around them.

Actions.Name: Paper Whirlwind
Actions.Content: The Paper Golem spins rapidly, creating a gust of wind from its loose pages. Each creature within 10 feet must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 12 (4d6) slashing damage and be pushed 10 feet away. The Paper Golem can use this action once per short rest.
